forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 43. West northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 62. West wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Rain Showers Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely after 5am. Partly cloudy. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. South southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 10am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 62. Southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
